codeSystems.name: AfibFlutterStatusCS
codeSystems.title: Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Status Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes representing the status of Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter assessment.

codeSystems.name: AssessmentContextCS
codeSystems.title: Assessment Context Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes defining the context or timing of a clinical assessment, particularly functional scores.

codeSystems.name: InitialCareIntensityCS
codeSystems.title: Initial Care Intensity Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the level of care provided during the patient's initial day(s) in the hospital.

codeSystems.name: MRsScoreCS
codeSystems.title: modified Rankin Scale (mRS) Score Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes representing the modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score for functional outcome.

codeSystems.name: MticiScoreCS
codeSystems.title: mTICI Score Code System
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem containing the codes to represent the mTICI score.

codeSystems.name: ProcedureTimingContextCS
codeSystems.title: Procedure Timing Context Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes defining the timing phase of a procedure relative to the encounter start (e.g., acute vs. post-acute).

codeSystems.name: StrokeProcNotDoneReasonCS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Procedure Not Done Reason Code System
codeSystems.description: Codes specifying the reason principal for not performing a key stroke procedure (Thrombolysis, Thrombectomy).

codeSystems.name: SwallowScreenTimeCS
codeSystems.title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category Code System
codeSystems.description: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.
